    Creating a plot from scratch

    plot-from-scratch.Rmd
    library(r3js)
    # Setup plot
data3js <- plot3js.new()

data3js <- plot3js.window(
  data3js,
  xlim   = c(0,10),
  ylim   = c(0,40),
  zlim   = c(0,1)
)

# Add a box
data3js <- box3js(data3js)

# Add an x axis label
data3js <- axis3js(
  data3js,
  side       = "x",
  cornerside = "l",
  at         = 0:10
)

# Show the plot
r3js(data3js)
